oauth_entity.comments:
This is a default app registry. You will need to populate it with your Client ID / Client Secret, and redirect URL.
For reference the redirect url should be: https://YOUR_INSTANCE_NAME.service-now.com/oauth_redirect.do
oauth_entity.name: Spotify
